product_name: The North Face GTD Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's
long_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt boosts your comfort during cool-weather runs and fast workouts. FlashDry fibers dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt help keep you visible; fabric offers a UV-protective rating of UPF 15.
short_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt boosts your comfort during cool-weather runs and fast workouts.
